In goal, Wojciech Szczesny will make his third consecutive start, taking over while Joan remains sidelined. In defence, Flick continues to rotate his centre-backs. arts.ttl: Sevilla vs Barcelona LIVE: Latest updates and team news - LaLiga EA Sports 2025/26
arts.sum: After losing their first two games of the season, Sevilla bounced back with three victories in their last five league matches. A win in Seville will see them return to the top of the table, as they currently sit second, two points behind leaders Real Madrid, with one game in hand.
